entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shoal Lake 11:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -27.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -30.7°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:39 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:39 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:39 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
